"Me Waspinator, Waspinator shoot you" Waspinator said and fired an 
explosive stinger at Pegatron not understanding what he was saying.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "black_ben14" <black_ben14@h...> wrote:
> Pegatron dodged the attack."I'm Pegatron ninja of the Tsubai clan 
and 
> minion of the shadow spirit.I'm here to duel anyone on an one on 
one 
> duel."he said while landing."Ans it seem you will be my first 
> adversary.Do you accept the challenge?" he continued while taking 
out 
> three Shuriken.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "catmastero" <catmastero@y...> wrote:
> > "Waspinator not know that" Waspinator said and shifted into robot 
> > mode, flew out the door and fired three energy blasts at the 
enemy 
> > from his gun.
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> > > --Megatron--
> > > 
> > > Megatron shakes his head, "Maybe... Provided we HAD any. For 
the 
> > > moment, we must destroy the intruder.... Yessss."
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "catmastero" <catmastero@y...> wrote:
> > > > "Why not use autoguns instead?" Waspinator asked.
> > > >
